A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved it! I’m genuinely shocked by the number of negative reviews from fans. It was funny\, touching and visually stunning. There are still so many unanswered questions\, but I’m hopeful they’ll be addressed in the next one. It certainly has an entirely different feel from The Force Awakens and the original trilogy\, but I think it only expanded the universe in a good\, just different way. Why would you want to recreate the originals? That’s what people complained about with Ep 7. I like that they’re each different\, and I absolutely enjoyed the hell out of this one.
